content.raw: Small idea: maybe instead of building all the pencil matrices during initialization, we could just build the ones for the pencil that gets passed to the solve.   This would just let you compute eigenfunctions/values for high modes without having to wait for all the pencils to be built, which takes a while for large/3D problems.
content.html: Small idea: maybe instead of building all the pencil matrices during initialization, we could just build the ones for the pencil that gets passed to the solve. This would just let you compute eigenfunctions/values for high modes without having to wait for all the pencils to be built, which takes a while for large/3D problems.
